title: Induction of Apoptotic Cell Death in Non-Small-Cell Lung Cancer Cells by MP28 Peptide Derived from
abstract: Marine algae are a prolific bioactive peptide source with a broad pharmacological potential. We characterized MP28, a cationic peptide isolated from the green alga
